title: ONT CARD CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to create and configure the ONT Card 
parameters.

Prior to entering this command the ONT must have been already created.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure equipment ont ( no slot (ont-slot-idx) ) | ( slot (ont-slot-idx) planned-card-type <Gpon::PlndCardType> plndnumdataports <Gpon::PlndNumDataPorts> plndnumvoiceports <Gpon::PlndNumVoicePorts> [ no port-type | port-type <Gpon::PortType> ] [ no transp-mode-rem | transp-mode-rem <Gpon::TranspMode> ] [ no no-mcast-control | no-mcast-control <Gpon::NoMcastCtrl> ] [ no admin-state | admin-state <Gpon::AdminStatus> ] )

command_parameters.name: planned-card-type
command_parameters.format: ( ethernet                            | 10_100base                            | pots                            | vdsl2pots                            | vdsl2                            | ethpots                            | video                            | veip                            | ds1                            | e1                            | hpna                            | moca                            | eth_adaptive )
values: eth_adaptive          : Self-adaptive between PPTP Ethernet and VEIP

command_parameters.name: plndnumdataports
command_parameters.description: planned number of data ports mandatory parameter - planned number of data ports - range: [0...16]

command_parameters.name: plndnumvoiceports
command_parameters.description: planned number of voice ports mandatory parameter - planned number of voice ports - range: [0...24]

command_parameters.name: [no] port-type
command_parameters.description: port type of the line card optional parameter with default value: "uni"

command_parameters.name: [no] transp-mode-rem
command_parameters.description: transparent mode of the line card optional parameter with default value: "disable"

command_parameters.name: [no] no-mcast-control
command_parameters.description: used to control whether the mcast related OMCI message should be sent to ONT optional parameter with default value: "disable"

command_parameters.name: [no] admin-state
command_parameters.description: administrative status of the interface optional parameter with default value: "up"
values: down                  : set the admin-state to down
up                    : set the admin-state to up

raw:
help configure equipment ont slot
ONT CARD CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==============================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to create and configure the ONT Card 
parameters.

Prior to entering this command the ONT must have been already created.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure equipment ont ( no slot (ont-slot-idx) ) | ( slot (ont-slot-idx) 
planned-card-type <Gpon::PlndCardType> plndnumdataports 
<Gpon::PlndNumDataPorts> plndnumvoiceports <Gpon::PlndNumVoicePorts> [ no 
port-type | port-type <Gpon::PortType> ] [ no transp-mode-rem | transp-mode-rem 
<Gpon::TranspMode> ] [ no no-mcast-control | no-mcast-control 
<Gpon::NoMcastCtrl> ] [ no admin-state | admin-state <Gpon::AdminStatus> ] )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "ONT Card Configuration Command" Resource Parameters


Resource Identifier        Description

(ont-slot-idx)             identification of the ont-slot

Table "ONT Card Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

planned-card-type          planned card type
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::PlndCardType>
                           Format:
                           ( ethernet
                           | 10_100base
                           | pots
                           | vdsl2pots
                           | vdsl2
                           | ethpots
                           | video
                           | veip
                           | ds1
                           | e1
                           | hpna
                           | moca
                           | eth_adaptive )
                           Possible values:
                           - ethernet              : 10/100/1000/10000 base-t
                           - 10_100base            : 10/100 base-t
                           - pots                  : pots
                           - vdsl2pots             : vdsl2/pots combo
                           - vdsl2                 : vdsl2
                           - ethpots               : ethernet/pots combo
                           - video                 : video
                           - veip                  : VEIP card
                           - ds1                   : ds1
                           - e1                    : e1
                           - hpna                  : hpna
                           - moca                  : moca
                           - eth_adaptive          : Self-adaptive between PPTP 
Ethernet and VEIP

plndnumdataports           planned number of data ports
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::PlndNumDataPorts>
                           Format:
                           - planned number of data ports
                           - range: [0...16]

plndnumvoiceports          planned number of voice ports
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::PlndNumVoicePorts>
                           Format:
                           - planned number of voice ports
                           - range: [0...24]

[no] port-type             port type of the line card
                           optional parameter with default value: "uni"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::PortType>
                           Format:
                           ( uni
                           | nni )
                           Possible values:
                           - uni                   : uni interface
                           - nni                   : nni interface

[no] transp-mode-rem       transparent mode of the line card
                           optional parameter with default value: "disable"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::TranspMode>
                           Format:
                           ( disable
                           | enable )
                           Possible values:
                           - disable               : disable transparent
                           - enable                : enable  transparent

[no] no-mcast-control      used to control whether the mcast related OMCI 
message should be sent to ONT 
                           optional parameter with default value: "disable"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::NoMcastCtrl>
                           Format:
                           ( disable
                           | enable )
                           Possible values:
                           - disable               : disable igmp NoMcastCtrl
                           - enable                : enable igmp NoMcastCtrl

[no] admin-state           administrative status of the interface
                           optional parameter with default value: "up"

                           Parameter type: <Gpon::AdminStatus>
                           Format:
                           ( down
                           | up )
                           Possible values:
                           - down                  : set the admin-state to down
                           - up                    : set the admin-state to up


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
